mapper.update: update T_DOCUMENT set C_SERIALNUMBER = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, C_PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, C_SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where C_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select doc.C_ID as doc_id, doc.C_SERIALNUMBER as doc_serialNumber, doc.C_TITLE as doc_title, doc.C_LEVEL as doc_level, doc.C_PRIORITY as doc_priority, doc.C_SENDER_ID as doc_senderId, doc.C_RECIEVER_ID as doc_recieverId, doc.C_SUBJECT as doc_subject, doc.C_DATETIME as doc_dateTime, doc.C_TYPE as doc_type, sender.C_ID as sender_id, sender.C_EMAIL as sender_email, sender.C_PASSWORD as sender_password, sender.C_ACCOUNT_TYPE as sender_accountType, reciever.C_ID as reciever_id, reciever.C_EMAIL as reciever_email, reciever.C_PASSWORD as reciever_password, reciever.C_ACCOUNT_TYPE as reciever_accountType, reciever.C_BELONG_ID as reciever_belongId from T_DOCUMENT doc left outer join T_ACCOUNT sender on doc.C_SENDER_ID = sender.C_ID left outer join T_ACCOUNT reciever on doc.C_RECIEVER_ID = reciever.C_ID where doc.C_ID = #{id}
